author: liyin
msg: [HBASE-9704] Catch NPE from TableServers.translateException in batchGet

Summary: batchGet had a bunch of retries and is supposed to move on in case the response from one regionserver was not populated. But in fact it runs into this NullPointerException and ends up quitting the retry.

author: liyin
msg: Summary: Made TestUpgradeFromHFileV1ToEncoding spin up fewer region servers, and made the timout longer while writing less data.

author: liyin
msg: Summary: EXTRA_TOLERANCE_MS was set 200 ms, which caused that unit test unstable in the Jenkins.
Test Plan: run this test 10 times
